headline: USB Resumes Institutional Bitcoin Custody Service Amid Deregulations
summary: U.S. Bancorp revives its bitcoin custody service for institutional clients, expanding into ETFs as crypto rules ease under deregulation.

headline: Citi Hands BlackRock $80B Assets in Wealth Deal
summary: Citigroup is entrusting BlackRock with tens and billions of dollars of clients' investments in a move that will outsource more of its wealth unit's offerings. Citi doesn't have an in-house asset management platform and is now doubling down on the advisory side of its business, reports Bloomberg's Todd Gillespie.

raw.headline: Citi Hands BlackRock $80B Assets in Wealth Deal
raw.summary: Citigroup is entrusting BlackRock with tens and billions of dollars of clients' investments in a move that will outsource more of its wealth unit's offerings. Citi doesn't have an in-house asset management platform and is now doubling down on the advisory side of its business, reports Bloomberg's Todd Gillespie.

headline: BlackRock to run $80 billion for Citi as bank refocuses wealth unit
summary: (Reuters) -BlackRock struck a deal with Citigroup to manage about $80 billion in assets for the bank's wealth management clients, Citi said on Thursday.  Clients currently overseen by Citi Investment Management (CIM) will continue to work with their Citi private bankers for wealth advice, asset allocation and strategy selection.

raw.headline: BlackRock to run $80 billion for Citi as bank refocuses wealth unit
raw.summary: (Reuters) -BlackRock struck a deal with Citigroup to manage about $80 billion in assets for the bank's wealth management clients, Citi said on Thursday.  Clients currently overseen by Citi Investment Management (CIM) will continue to work with their Citi private bankers for wealth advice, asset allocation and strategy selection.

headline: Citi to Deliver New Customized Portfolio Offering Powered by BlackRock to Citi Wealth Clients Globally
summary: NEW YORK, September 04, 2025--Citi Wealth today announced the selection of BlackRock to create a new portfolio offering for its clients – Citi Portfolio Solutions powered by BlackRock. This offering will combine the strategic investment advisory and planning capabilities of the leading global bank with the investment management and technology strengths of one of the world’s preeminent asset managers.

raw.headline: Citi to Deliver New Customized Portfolio Offering Powered by BlackRock to Citi Wealth Clients Globally
raw.summary: NEW YORK, September 04, 2025--Citi Wealth today announced the selection of BlackRock to create a new portfolio offering for its clients – Citi Portfolio Solutions powered by BlackRock. headline: Citi's Kaiser Sees 'Sneaky Bull Case' in Corporate America
summary: Stuart Kaiser, head of equity trading strategy at Citi, sees "some positive trends on the corporate side of things" as he expects the potential for a spending and hiring upside for companies into the end of the year.
